item.title: 6 Best Games You Can ONLY Play On PS5
item.description:
2025 marks the fifth year of the PS5 era in full swing after its debut in 2020. These consoles were hard to find at first, but now it’s pretty easy to buy a PS5, so long as one can stomach the price jump. PlayStation fans know that the PS6 is probably around the corner, as most consoles tend to have a six- to seven-year lifespan.

So, what has the PS5 offered to its fans over these five years in terms of showcasing exclusives ? Games that have not appeared on the PS4 or PC in any capacity. Some of the best PS5 games have gone multi-platform, like Marvel’s Spider-Man 2 . Let's look at which exclusives have actually remained exclusive so far.

Ghost Of Yotei

So Far, So Good

Ghost of Yotei
10 /10
28
8.8 /10
Released
October 2, 2025

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
Mature 17+ / Blood and Gore, Drug Reference, Intense Violence, Language, Partial Nudity, Use of Alcohol
Powered by

Ghost of Tsushima began as a PS4 exclusive, but it later received an Enhanced Edition that was also released on PC. So far, its sequel, Ghost of Yotei , is a PS5 exclusive and is shaping up to be one of the best-selling games of 2025. It’s easy to see why, as it’s yet another phenomenal open-world game set in the feudal era of Japan.

Atsu is a new main character, and the game itself is set hundreds of years after the original. As such, players don’t need to play Ghost of Tsushima first to check it out. If they did play the original, then they’ll know that this sequel is more of the same, but better. With tons more weapons to collect, beautiful graphics, and quick load times to get straight into the action, it may wind up being one of the best PS5 games of all time.

Astro Bot

Outclassing Mario

Astro Bot
10 /10
56
9.6 /10
Released
September 6, 2024

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
E10+ For Everyone 10+ Due To Crude Humor, Fantasy Violence
Powered by

There are two games starring the lovable Astro Bots that are exclusive to the PS5. Astro's Playroom was a free tech demo that came packaged at launch, and it almost acted like a blueprint for Astro Bot four years later. While it is very short, players should still check out Astro's Playroom . The real superstar game, though, is Astro Bot , which blew everyone out of the water when it launched in 2024.

It was a celebration of everything PlayStation, from various console components on display to iconic video game heroes appearing as cute little robots. The PlayStation worship was only a small fraction of why players enjoyed the game, though. The platforming is imaginative from level to level, hitting that perfect difficulty barrier between too easy and too hard. It’s hard to imagine such a dedicated fan letter ever appearing on another platform.

Death Stranding 2: On The Beach

Delivering PS5-Tier Quality

Death Stranding 2: On the Beach
25
9.0 /10
Released
June 26, 2025

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
Mature 17+ // Violence, Blood and Gore, Partial Nudity, Strong Language
Powered by

Death Stranding started as a PS4 exclusive before being ported to platforms like PC and Xbox consoles. The same fate may await Death Stranding 2: On the Beach , but for now, this is another great PS5 exclusive released in 2025. It continues Sam's journey from the first game, except this time around, his mission is to deliver packages and link up bunkers across Mexico and Australia.

With a backpack full of packages, players traverse deserts, mountains, and rushing rivers. They're given more ways to progress through these hazards faster than in the first game, too. The quality of life improvements make the gameplay less frustrating, and it's more fun to discover new gameplay elements. One fantastic late-game example is a coffin that can be used as a surfboard.

Demon’s Souls

From The PS3 To The PS5

Demon's Souls
10 /10
8.5 /10
Released
November 12, 2020

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Blood and Gore, Violence
Powered by

Demon’s Souls was a PS3 exclusive for over a decade until it was remade on the PS5. This was THE launch game to pick up, and it was everything that fans hoped it would be.

While most of the game remains untouched, except for the graphics, there were a few tweaks made to the gameplay to make it feel smoother. It’s still one of the hardest Soulslike games FromSoftware has ever made, but that’s what makes it so engaging for a lot of hardcore fans. Bloodborne is another FromSoftware Soulslike game that is trapped on one system, the PS4, even though it is playable through backwards compatibility on the PS5. PC fans would assuredly love to see the Demon’s Souls remake and Bloodborne appear on digital platforms like Steam sooner rather than later.

Destruction AllStars

A Twisted Reboot

Destruction AllStars
5 /10
Released
February 2, 2021

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
T For Teen due to Fantasy, Violence
Powered by

Destruction AllStars was released not long after the PS5 launched, acting as a sort of spiritual successor to Twisted Metal . It's also a car combat game, but with a more Fortnite -like design. Characters are more colorful and poppy, and the violence is toned down.

Single-player and multiplayer missions are set in arenas instead of big open cities. It may not be the Twisted Metal game that many PlayStation fans want, but it's a serviceable spiritual successor nonetheless. Unfortunately, the online servers were shut down in 2024, but there are still plenty of reasons to play the single-player mode. This also probably means it’s never going to get a port to other systems.

R-Type Final 3 Evolved

A Blast From The Past

R-Type Final 3 Evolved

Released
April 25, 2023
Platform(s)
PlayStation 5
Powered by

Shoot ‘em ups, or SHMUPs, were a hugely popular genre in the 80s, 90s, and even into the early 2000s. R-Type was one of the bigger SHMUP franchises, and while the series today is not what it was back in the arcade era, it continues to receive updates. R-Type Final 3 Evolved is one of the latest releases, and it’s completely exclusive to the PS5.

It probably flew under the radar when it was released in 2023, as it’s very hard for smaller games to get noticed in the current market. That said, R-Type Final 3 Evolved is a hidden gem for SHMUP fans to discover. The action is bombastic, the controls are tight, and the upgrades make it one of the more accessible SHMUPs in years, making it a great intro to the genre.

item.title: Roblox: Military Tycoon Codes (October 2025)
item.description:

In Military Tycoon , Roblox players must build their base, trying their best to attack and not be defeated. The game has plenty of exciting activities. For example, players can destroy bases of NPCs or even other Roblox players using a wide variety of vehicles to get valuable in-game resources. In this article, fans of the game will find Military Tycoon codes that they can redeem for all sorts of great in-game goodies.

Updated October 21, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Several rewards are available for Military Tycoon , giving you the chance to collect boosts, Diamonds, and other useful items. These bonuses can help you progress faster, upgrade your base, and expand your military power with ease. It’s a good time to log in and claim everything while the offers last. Be sure to return regularly for more updates and future rewards.

How to Redeem Codes in Military Tycoon

Everything that players need to do to redeem codes in Roblox: Military Tycoon is mentioned below. Follow these steps to claim free rewards:

  1. Open Roblox and launch Military Tycoon.
  2. Look at the left-bottom side of the screen and find the Thumbs Up button. Press on it.
  3. In the pop-up menu, insert the code from this article and then click the REDEEM button.

Players should keep in mind that codes in Military Tycoon are time-limited, just like in many other Roblox games. With this in mind, they should try to redeem any active Military Tycoon codes as soon as possible.

How to Play Military Tycoon

Military Tycoon is a game where players must build a base, but there is also a lot of additional content. Base building is similar to other games of this genre, but at the same time, players also organize raids on other bases, complete missions to liberate and capture territories and build tanks, helicopters, and other equipment.

Tycoon is a popular genre that is really quite interesting, especially on the Roblox platform. If players want to find something similar but often stumble upon low-quality experiences, there's no need to worry. Below, they'll be able to find some of the best Roblox games like Military Tycoon :

item.title: Roblox: Smileys Codes (October 2025)
item.description:
Jump Links

  • All Smileys Codes
  • How to Redeem Smileys Codes
  • How to Get New Smileys Codes

Roblox has a lot of interesting games to offer, and one of the most unique ones is Smileys . In this experience, you will have to collect various pets that look like emojis and use them to dig different blocks. By doing this, you can find many treasures that will then turn into gold. Also, the game allows you to get some resources and items for free by activating codes. In this guide, we will tell you about these Smileys codes and explain how to use them.

Updated October 21, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: You can unlock a mix of rewards in Smileys , including useful boosts and items that make progression smoother. These bonuses can help you gather resources faster and improve your gameplay efficiency. It’s a good opportunity to take advantage of the current offers while they’re still active. Make sure to check back often for any future rewards or code updates.

All Smileys Codes

Working Smileys Codes

  • MYSTERYBOX – Gives you Mystery Boxes. (NEW)
  • FIRSTCODE – Gives you x5 Bombs, x3 Dynamites, x1 Instant Converter, x3 Gold Shards, x3 Speed Shards, and x3 Luck Shards.

Expired Smileys Codes

Currently, Smileys doesn’t have expired promo codes. We will update this section of our guide if any of these coupons become unavailable to you and other Roblox users.

The items you can get by redeeming Smileys codes are very useful and can improve your gaming experience. Various Shards provide you with temporary buffs that increase the amount of Gold you get or allow you to obtain better pets from lootboxes. Bombs and Dynamites can be used to damage blocks, making it much easier to find treasures.

We don’t recommend waiting too long before using Smileys codes as they may expire in the future. This will make all free bonuses you can get by activating them unavailable, which will slow down your progress in this Roblox game.

How to Redeem Smileys Codes

Codes in Smileys can be quite helpful, and the rewards they provide you with are decent. However, if you want to get them, you will have to learn how to redeem these coupons, which is not that difficult. All you need to do is follow these few steps, and you will quickly get your freebies for activating Smileys codes:

  • Launch Smileys and wait for this Roblox experience to load.
  • After that, click on the Settings button on the left side of your screen.
  • In the Settings menu, you will see the line where you can enter promo codes. Type the one you want to use.
  • Click on the Redeem button.
  • The reward is yours.

How to Get New Smileys Codes

The developers of this Roblox game may add more freebies in future patches, and we will list such updates in our guide if this happens. Feel free to bookmark this article and use it from time to time as a source of information about new Smileys codes. Also, you can follow the official media related to this experience:

  • Discord Server

item.title: Xbox Boss Comments on Next-Gen Console Power
item.description:
Xbox ' s next-generation console will provide a "very high-end" experience for gamers, according to company president Sarah Bond. Not much is known about the next-gen Xbox console at this early stage, but according to Bond's recent statements, the development of the ROG Xbox Ally could be the key to understanding Microsoft's mindset towards the creation of its next console.

It has been nearly five years since the Xbox Series X and its more budget-friendly counterpart, the Series S, made their worldwide debut, beating the PlayStation 5's race to the market by just two days. Estimated sales figures for the Xbox Series X|S from this February, released by publisher Take-Two Interactive, came in at around 30 million units sold, placing it behind the PS5 and at only about a fifth of the Nintendo Switch's sales. That third-place performance and some other business decisions at Microsoft had led to rumors that Xbox was getting ready to get out of the console market.

Xbox President Says Next Console Will Provide a 'Premium' Experience

But those rumors were quashed following reports from October 20 in which Bond confirmed Xbox's next-gen console is in development. One day later, Bond appeared on Mashable's YouTube channel. Her appearance seemed intended mainly to discuss the ROG Xbox Ally, but the conversation also veered into the next-gen console's development. Asked if she was able to provide any additional information at this early stage, Bond was reserved in her answer but responded that the upcoming console will give players "a very premium, very high-end curated experience."

Bond also hinted that Xbox's current strategy with console development may be hidden in the design of the new handheld gaming computer. Promising a handheld able to run both Xbox and PC games on its portable screen through cloud gaming and let players pick up where they left off on their not-so-mobile devices, the ROG Xbox Ally started to sell out within hours of the opening of its pre-orders. While it's been a very popular buy, it's also faced criticism in categories ranging from performance issues to the difficulty of managing a gaming system reliant on Windows 11.

The ROG Ally X is priced at $999, and the interviewer showed some concern that Xbox's recent pricing moves could potentially restrict accessibility for some gamers. Bond tried to quell the worry by noting that the ROG Xbox Ally is priced at $400 less than the Ally X, stating that Xbox still wants to provide options for gamers of different budgets. Still, with the recent $10 monthly price increase to Game Pass Ultimate and the raising of prices for the Xbox Series X and S, Bond may have more work to do to draw in budget-conscious gamers.

Source: Variety

item.title: This Pokemon Legends: Z-A Mega Shard Farming Route is Virtually Unbeatable
item.description:
Mega Evolution is the heart and soul of Pokemon Legends: Z-A , and players looking to get the most out of the mechanic are likely going to need to farm for Mega Shards sooner or later. With Mega Shards used as the currency required to purchase Mega Stones from Quasartico, Pokemon Legends: Z-A players are going to need quite a few in order to obtain every Mega Stone in the game. As such, following the best Mega Shard farming method in Pokemon Legends: Z-A is in the player's best interest for the sake of efficiently collecting these items.

Finding these Mega Shards is as easy as using a damaging move on the outcrops of Mega Crystals scattered throughout Lumiose City. Players simply need to lock onto a group of crystals and send out a Pokemon from their team to attack and destroy it for a drop of a few Mega Shards. However, there is a way to streamline this process beyond simply wandering around the city looking for Mega Crystals to smash.

Pokemon Legends: Z-A's Best Mega Shard Farming Method is Surprisingly Efficient

To collect every Mega Stone in Pokemon Legends: Z-A , players will need a total of 7,980 Mega Shards to purchase all on offer from Quasartico. Thankfully, not every Mega Stone is obtained from Quasartico, with some being purchased from the Stone Emporium for Poke Dollars and others gained by defeating Rogue Mega Evolutions. Still, that's a hefty sum of Mega Shards players will need to spend, so using this farming method is a must to cut down on the time and effort necessary to collect them all.

Players can only hold 999 Mega Shards at a time, so they will need to periodically head to Quasartico to spend them before resuming the farming route.

How to Use Legends: Z-A's Best Mega Shard Farming Route

  • Hotel Z Rooftop
  • Around Prism Tower
  • Wild Zone 9 Rooftop
  • Alley Behind Restaurant Le Yeah

The first stop on this Mega Shard farming route is the rooftop of Hotel Z, which can be accessed by climbing the ladder next to the entrance. After clearing out all the Mega Crystals here, players will want to make their way around the base of Prism Tower, breaking all the crystals along its wall. The next stop should be the western side of the map in Wild Zone 9 in the Magenta District of Lumiose City and smash the crystals on the rooftops there. Finally, players should head north to Restaurant Le Yeah across from the Quasartico building and smash all the crystals in the alley behind it. At this point, players can spend their Shards nearby at Quasartico and head back to Hotel Z to start again, as the crystals should have respawned by this time.

Why This Mega Shard Farm in Pokemon Legends: Z-A is So Effective

These locations form the ideal Mega Shard farming route in Pokemon Legends: Z-A because they contain the highest density of crystals in the game's map. With the right setup, players can quickly smash these crystals for the motherlode and move on to the next area in no time. As such, using a Pokemon with high Speed and access to fast attacks with short cooldowns is ideal, but really any creature will work.

Lucario makes a good companion for this farming route since it has access to fast moves like Bullet Punch and Extreme Speed that can make short work of the crystals. Alternatively, a Pokemon with good ranged attack options works well too, since it can reach the crystals higher up on the walls of buildings without the need to get closer to the crystal before attacking, saving some animation time. Greninja with Water Shuriken, Water Pulse, and Swift works well for this purpose.

To maximize the number of Mega Shards dropped, players will want the highest level Pink Canari Plush, which can be obtained from Racine Construction for a total of 16 Colorful Screws.

52
4.8 /10

Pokemon Legends: Z-A
